sections.description: A powerful WordPress plugin that helps developers and designers create visually stunning, high-performance websites with ease right inside the Gutenberg editor.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/paytoday-woocommerce directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Adaire Blocks > Enable/Disable blocks > Make use of the blocks in the Gutenberg Editor
